titles.title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to prohibit the inclusion of legislative provisions and nonemergency spending in emergency appropriation laws.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 3/27/1998--Introduced. Amends Federal law to provide that: (1) any legislative provision included in an emergency supplemental appropriation law shall not take effect and none of the funds appropriated by any law may be expended or obligated to carry out such provision; and (2) any nonemergency discretionary appropriation included in such a law shall not become available for expenditure or obligation.
